content: Insurance PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019Is it safe/advisable to buy insurance online instead of through a financial advisor? If online, must I process the claims myself?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Charmaine Ng, The Code Breaker at @ Every Chye Peng StallLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Mar 2019You can purchase certain insurances on your own. Insurances such as travel insurance are easy to claim and is more direct in their clauses in the sense that the claimable and non claimable criteria are all clearly laid out for x amount of premium you paid.For other insurances like whole life, term, hospitalization, critical illnesses etc. Can be a little more complicated and differs across some insurance providers (triple claim, one time claim, early stage, late stage etc.) So for these it's usually more advisable to go to financial advisers who are more aware and trained in this aspect.0 comments0
